title: K300 Series Features
description: Say Hello To Keurig 2.0 K300 Series Brewing System.  Brew a cup and a piping hot carafe all at the touch of a button. The K300 Series brewer features include a 60 ounce water reservoir, interactive touch display, and a strength control setting.

asset.author: Keurig Inc
asset.hookText: Say Hello To Keurig® 2.0 K300 Series Brewing System.  Brew a cup and a piping hot carafe all at the touch of a button. The K300 Series brewer features include a 60 ounce water reservoir, interactive touch display, and a strength control setting.

transcripts: Say hello to the next generation of Keurig. The Keurig 2.0 K300 series. Keurig 2.0 is the first Keurig system to brew a cup and a carafe at the touch of a button. Choose a K-cup pack to brew a single cup or a K-carafe pack to brew a four cup carafe. It's so smart, so simple, so Keurig. With Keurig 2.0 brewing technology designed to read each portion pack lid. To brew the perfect beverage every time. The Keurig 2.0 K300 series features a 60-ounce water reservoir, touch display, 9 brew sizes, and strength control. The Keurig 2.0 K300 series brewer makes it easy to enjoy your favorite beverages at the touch of a button. Enjoy 400 varieties from 60 brands you know and love. All with the guarantee of Keurig quality. So you always know you're brewing the best. So smart, so simple, so Keurig.
